content.question: This question is designed to test your ability to work with and understand historical documents. Write an essay that: Provides an appropriate, explicitly stated thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question and does NOT simply restate the question. Discusses a majority of the documents individually and specifically. Demonstrates understanding of the basic meaning of a majority of the documents. Supports the thesis with appropriate interpretations of a majority of the documents. Analyzes point of view or bias in at least three documents. Analyzes the documents by explicitly grouping them in at least three appropriate ways. Analyze the factors that contributed to the instability of the Weimar Republic in the period 1918–1933.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
